title: Lucius Annæus Seneca, the philosopher, his booke of the shortnesse of life translated into an English poem.
author: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D.
publisher: By Daniel Frere, at the red Bull in little Britaine,
notes: Translation attributed to Sir Ralph Freeman--Cf. Wing and STC (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
